summary:
Adding more guards in Skyrim!
Vanilla!

Easy to install.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://postimg.org/image/6lrh7oy55/][img]http://s12.postimg.org/6lrh7oy55/Drawing.jpg[/img][/url]

[b]about:[/b]

Do you think Skyrim is unprotected by so few guards? This mod will give more guards in skyrim.
In the next updates this mod will have added more guards in all major cities and small towns! 

Watch this mod grow by downloading updates! I have choosen to make this mod available during the devlopment! 

New Option file! Version 1.4 is only available for Dragonborn users!
1.4 will be available for non drgonborn owners. (TBA)
Enjoy!



[b]Known Issues:[/b]
The Imperial guards might not do the job as a guard.
Tell me if you find any problems! it would be very greatful!

[b]Installation:[/b]
Download
Copy to skyrim data folder

[b]With NMM:[/b]
Download and start mod

[b]Uninstall:[/b]

Delete the mod

[b]My other mod(s):[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36872//?]Tales of the wolf[/url]


[b]Change log:[/b]
Version 1.4
Requires Dragonborn DLC!!
Added Imperial soldiers to solstheim!
NOTE: 1.4 is only in beta stages!

Version 1.3
Added more guards outside Whiterun! 
Added some more guards inside windhelm!

Version 1.2 
More Imperial guards added to rorikstead

Version 1.1
Added some new guards in Whiterun market
Various bugfixes
author: DrmZmodZ
